about.subtitle: Our Story
about.title: Where Coffee Meets Art
about.description: Born from a passion for memorable brunches, Cappuccino Brunch is more than a restaurant — it's a haven for lovers of good food and good moments.
about.content: We believe that every meal should be a celebration. That's why we combine fresh ingredients with creative techniques to create dishes that are as beautiful as they are delicious. From our specialty coffee to our fluffy pancakes, every detail is designed to make you smile.
